Summary: Star like but I would bet money it was a disc.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Statesboro
There were no other sightings in Statesboro on or around March 9th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailssame star like object object appeared to be over town,it was very bright and flashing red and green bobbing up and down side to side, it was stationary and i started flashing it with my red and white led light and it eventually began moving towards other side of town,we got in the car like we have before to chase it,we followed it to the other side of town into to country,i pulled onto a dirt road with a good view and parked and we watched it slowly disappear into the distance headed towards candler county.....it wasnt a star or a plane or helicopter,all three of us saw it but its nothing new to us,im just surprised we kept up with it that far because i have figured out these things can get somewhere very very fast and seemingly effortlessly in the process....i tried to catch a video but i do not have the proper equipment to do so....i was very excited as always....i will continue my reports i am sure.
